title: Diagnosis and Monitoring of Tinnitus Treatment: Machine Learning-Enhanced Science Project-Based Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental statistics, basic data analysis concepts, and Python programming experience
context.additional_context: Experimental data analysis and team-based project implementation using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can describe preprocessing techniques for applying ESA data collected from animal models to machine learning models.
Learners can identify frequency band characteristics related to tinnitus and visually analyze the effectiveness of EES treatment.
Learners can design and validate a tinnitus diagnostic classification system using SVM and SHAP models.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
